00032 template <
00033   class CHAR_TYPE = char,
00034   int COPY_ON_WRITE = 1,
00035   uint64_t BUCKET_BYTES = 1024
00036   >
00037 class bbt_string
00038 {  
00039 public:
00040   typedef CHAR_TYPE value_type;
00041   typedef CHAR_TYPE CharT;
00042   typedef uint32_t  ReferT;
00043   typedef bbt_string<CHAR_TYPE, COPY_ON_WRITE, BUCKET_BYTES> SelfT;
00044   typedef std::size_t size_t;
00045 
00046   enum 
00047     {
00048       BUCKET_LENGTH = BUCKET_BYTES/sizeof(CharT) -1,
00049       BUCKET_SIZE = BUCKET_BYTES + sizeof(ReferT)
00050     };
00051 
00052   
00053   static const size_t npos;
00054 protected:
00055 
00056   struct BUCKET_
00057   {
00058     char p_[BUCKET_SIZE];
00059 
00060     inline BUCKET_()
00061     {
00062       *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) = 1;
00063     }
00064     
00065     inline CharT& operator [] (size_t i)
00066     {
00067       assert(i<=BUCKET_LENGTH);
00068       return *((CharT*)p_ + i);
00069     }
00070 
00071     inline size_t length()const
00072     {
00073       size_t i=0;
00074       for (;i<BUCKET_LENGTH; i++)
00075         if (*((CharT*)p_ + i)=='\0')
00076           return i;
00077 
00078       assert(false);
00079     }
00080 
00081     inline void refer()
00082     {
00083       *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) += 1;
00084     }
00085 
00086     inline bool is_refered()
00087     {
00088       if (*(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES)>1)
00089         return true;
00090       return false;
00091     }
00092 
00093     inline void derefer()
00094     {
00095       if (*(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) != 0)
00096         *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) -= 1;
00097     }
00098     
00099     void clear_reference()
00100     {
00101       *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) = 1;
00102     }    
00103 
00104   friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const BUCKET_& b)
00105     {
00106       os<<b.p_<<"("<<*(ReferT*)(b.p_ + BUCKET_BYTES)<<")";
00107       return os;
00108     }
00109     
00110   }
00111     ;
00112 
00113   struct INDEX_
00114   {
00115     size_t len_;
00116     BUCKET_* bptr_;
00117 
00118     inline INDEX_()
00119     {
00120       len_ = 0;
00121       bptr_ = NULL;
00122     }
00123 
00124     bool operator == (size_t i) const
00125     {
00126       return len_==i;
00127     }
00128 
00129     bool operator > (size_t i) const
00130     {
00131       return len_ > i;
00132     }
00133 
00134     bool operator < (size_t i) const
00135     {
00136       return len_ < i;
00137     }
00138 
00139     
00140     bool operator != (size_t i) const
00141     {
00142       return len_ != i;
00143     }
00144     
00145   friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const INDEX_& b)
00146     {
00147       os<<"["<<b.len_<<"]"<<*b.bptr_;
00148       return os;
00149     }
00150     
00151   };
00152   
00153 public:
00154   class const_iterator;
00155   
00156   class iterator :
00157     public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, CharT> {
00158 
00159   friend class const_iterator;
00160   public:
00161     iterator(INDEX_* indice=NULL, size_t ii=0 , size_t bi=0 )
00162     {
00163       indice_ = indice;
00164       ii_ = ii;
00165       bi_ = bi;
00166     }
00167     
00168     ~iterator() {}
00169 
00170     // The assignment and relational operators are straightforward
00171     iterator& operator = (const iterator& other)
00172     {
00173       ii_ = other.ii_;
00174       bi_ = other.bi_;
00175       indice_ = other.indice_;
00176       
00177       return(*this);
00178     }
00179 
00180     bool operator==(const iterator& other)const
00181     {
00182       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ == other.bi_ );
00183     }
00184 
00185     bool operator!=(const iterator& other)const
00186     {
00187       return(indice_ != other.indice_ || ii_ != other.ii_ || bi_ != other.bi_ );
00188     }
00189 
00190     bool operator < (const iterator& other)const
00191     {
00192       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ < other.ii_ || ii_==(size_t)-1 && other.ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00193         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ < other.bi_ );
00194     }
00195     
00196     bool operator > (const iterator& other)const
00197     {
00198       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ > other.ii_ || ii_!=(size_t)-1 && other.ii_==(size_t)-1)
00199         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ > other.bi_ );
00200     }
00201 
00202     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00203     // SQueue.
00204     iterator& operator++()
00205     {
00206       if (indice_ == NULL)
00207         return(*this);
00208 
00209       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00210       {
00211         ii_ = 0;
00212         bi_ = 0;
00213         return(*this);
00214       }
00215 
00216       bi_++;
00217       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00218       {
00219         bi_ = 0;
00220         ii_++;
00221       }
00222 
00223       return *this;
00224       
00225     }
00226 
00227     iterator operator++(int)
00228     {
00229       iterator tmp(*this);
00230       if (indice_ == NULL)
00231         return(*this);
00232 
00233       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00234       {
00235         ii_ = 0;
00236         bi_ = 0;
00237         return(tmp);
00238       }
00239 
00240       bi_++;
00241       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00242       {
00243         bi_ = 0;
00244         ii_++;
00245       }
00246 
00247       return(tmp);
00248     }
00249 
00250     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00251     // SQueue.
00252     iterator& operator--()
00253     {
00254       if (indice_ == NULL)
00255         return(*this);
00256       
00257       if (bi_==0)
00258       {
00259         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00260           ii_--;
00261         
00262         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00263           return(*this);
00264         
00265         size_t  lastl = ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_;
00266         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_-lastl - 1;
00267       }
00268       else
00269         bi_--;
00270 
00271       return(*this);
00272     }
00273 
00274     iterator operator--(int)
00275     {
00276       iterator tmp(*this);
00277       if (indice_ == NULL)
00278         return(*this);
00279       
00280       if (bi_==0)
00281       {
00282         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00283           ii_--;
00284         
00285         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00286           return(*this);
00287         
00288         size_t  lastl = (ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_);
00289         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_- lastl - 1;
00290       }
00291       else
00292         bi_--;
00293 
00294       return(tmp);
00295     }
00296 
00297     // Return a reference to the value in the node.  I do this instead
00298     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the
00299     // node directly.
00300     CharT& operator*()
00301     {
00302       assert(indice_[ii_].bptr_!=NULL);
00303       
00304       if (indice_[ii_].bptr_->is_refered())
00305       {
00306         BUCKET_* bu = SelfT::new_bucket();
00307         memcpy(bu, indice_[ii_].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
00308         indice_[ii_].bptr_->derefer();
00309         indice_[ii_].bptr_ = bu;
00310         bu->clear_reference();
00311       }
00312 
00313       return (*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_];
00314     }
00315     
00316     iterator operator + (size_t i)const
00317     {
00318       iterator tmp (*this);
00319 
00320       for (;i>0; i--)
00321         ++tmp;
00322       
00323       return tmp;
00324     }
00325 
00326     iterator operator - (size_t i)const
00327     {
00328       iterator tmp(*this);
00329 
00330       for (;i>0; i--)
00331         --tmp;
00332       
00333       return tmp;
00334     }
00335 
00336     size_t operator - (const iterator& other) const
00337     {
00338       iterator tmp(other);
00339       size_t i = 0;
00340 
00341       if (indice_ != other.indice_)
00342         return -1;
00343 
00344       if (*this>other)
00345         for (; tmp!=*this; i++)
00346           ++tmp;
00347       
00348       if (*this<other)
00349         for (; tmp!=*this; i--)
00350           --tmp;      
00351       
00352       return i;
00353     }
00354     
00355   protected:
00356     size_t bi_;//index in bucket
00357     size_t ii_;// indice index
00358     INDEX_* indice_;
00359   };

00595       bi_ = other.bi_;

00597

00621     }

00624     // SQueue.

00628         return(*this);

00639         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_-indice_[ii_-1].len_ - 1;

00641       else
00642         bi_--;
00643

00645     }

00648     {

00650       if (indice_ == NULL)
00651         return(*this);
00652       
00653       if (bi_==0)
00654       {
00655         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00656           ii_--;
00657         
00658         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00659           return(*this);
00660

00662         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_-lastl - 1;

00664       else
00665         bi_--;
00666

00668     }
00669

00671     // SQueue.

00673     {
00674       if (indice_ == NULL)
00675         return(*this);
00676 
00677       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00678       {
00679         ii_ = 0;
00680         bi_ = 0;
00681         return(*this);
00682       }
00683

00685       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)

00693 
00694     reverse_iterator operator--(int)
00695     {
00696       reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00697 
00698       if (indice_ == NULL)
00699         return(*this);
00700 
00701       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00702       {
00703         ii_ = 0;
00704         bi_ = 0;
00705         return(tmp);
00706       }

00718     // Return a reference to the value in the node.  I do this instead
00719     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the
00720     // node directly.
00721     CharT& operator*()
00722     {
00723       assert(indice_[ii_].bptr_ != NULL);
00724       
00725       if (indice_[ii_].bptr_->is_refered())
00726       {
00727         BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
00728         memcpy(bu, indice_[ii_].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
00729         indice_[ii_].bptr_->derefer();
00730         indice_[ii_].bptr_ = bu;
00731         bu->clear_reference();
00732       }
00733 
00734       return (*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_];

00736

00751       for (;i>0; i--)
00752         ++tmp;
00753       
00754       return tmp;
00755     }
00756 
00757     size_t operator - (const reverse_iterator& other) const
00758     {
00759       reverse_iterator tmp(other);
00760       size_t i = 0;
00761 
00762       if (indice_ != other.indice_)
00763         return -1;
00764 
00765       if (*this>other)
00766         for (; tmp!=*this; i++)
00767           ++tmp;
00768       
00769       if (*this<other)
00770         for (; tmp!=*this; i--)
00771           --tmp;      
00772       
00773       return i;
00774     }
00775 
00776   private:
00777     size_t bi_;//index in bucket
00778     size_t ii_;// indice index
00779     INDEX_* indice_;
00780   };

00783   class const_reverse_iterator :
00784     public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, CharT> {
00785   public:
00786     const_reverse_iterator(const INDEX_* indice, size_t ii=0 , size_t bi=0 )
00787     {
00788       indice_ = indice;
00789       ii_ = ii;
00790       bi_ = bi;
00791     }
00792 
00793 
00794     const_reverse_iterator(const reverse_iterator& other)
00795     {
00796       ii_ = other.ii_;
00797       bi_ = other.bi_;
00798       indice_ = other.indice_;
00799     }
00800     
00801     ~const_reverse_iterator() {}
00802 
00803     // The assignment and relational operators are straightforward
00804     const_reverse_iterator& operator=(const const_reverse_iterator& other)
00805     {
00806       ii_ = other.ii_;
00807       bi_ = other.bi_;
00808       indice_ = other.indice_;
00809       return(*this);
00810     }
00811 
00812     bool operator==(const const_reverse_iterator& other) const
00813     {
00814       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ == other.bi_ );
00815     }
00816 
00817     bool operator!=(const const_reverse_iterator& other) const
00818     {
00819       return(indice_ != other.indice_ || ii_ != other.ii_ || bi_ != other.bi_ );
00820     }
00821     
00822     bool operator > (const const_reverse_iterator& other)const
00823     {
00824       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ < other.ii_ || ii_==(size_t)-1 && other.ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00825         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ < other.bi_ );
00826     }
00827 
00828     bool operator < (const const_reverse_iterator& other)const
00829     {
00830       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ > other.ii_ || ii_!=(size_t)-1 && other.ii_==(size_t)-1)
00831         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ > other.bi_ );
00832     }
00833 
00834     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00835     // SQueue.
00836     const_reverse_iterator& operator++()
00837     {
00838       if (indice_ == NULL)
00839         return(*this);
00840       
00841       if (bi_==0)
00842       {
00843         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00844           ii_--;
00845         
00846         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00847           return(*this);
00848         
00849         size_t  lastl = ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_;
00850         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_-indice_[ii_-1].len_ - 1;
00851       }
00852       else
00853         bi_--;
00854 
00855       return(*this);
00856     }
00857 
00858     const_reverse_iterator operator++(int)
00859     {
00860       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00861       if (indice_ == NULL)
00862         return(*this);
00863       
00864       if (bi_==0)
00865       {
00866         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00867           ii_--;
00868         
00869         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00870           return(*this);
00871         
00872         size_t  lastl = ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_;
00873         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_ - lastl - 1;
00874       }
00875       else
00876         bi_--;
00877 
00878       return(tmp);
00879     }
00880 
00881     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00882     // SQueue.
00883     const_reverse_iterator& operator--()
00884     {
00885       if (indice_ == NULL)
00886         return(*this);
00887 
00888       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00889       {
00890         ii_ = 0;
00891         bi_ = 0;
00892         return(*this);
00893       }
00894 
00895       bi_++;
00896       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00897       {
00898         bi_ = 0;
00899         ii_++;
00900       }
00901 
00902       return(*this);
00903     }
00904 
00905     const_reverse_iterator operator--(int)
00906     {
00907       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00908       if (indice_ == NULL)
00909         return(*this);
00910 
00911       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00912       {
00913         ii_ = 0;
00914         bi_ = 0;
00915         return(tmp);
00916       }
00917 
00918       bi_++;
00919       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00920       {
00921         bi_ = 0;
00922         ii_++;
00923       }
00924 
00925       return(tmp);
00926     }
00927 
00928     // Return a reference to the value in the node.  I do this instead
00929     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the
00930     // node directly.
00931     const CharT& operator*() const
00932     {
00933       return (*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_];
00934     }
00935 
00936     
00937     const_reverse_iterator operator + (size_t i)const
00938     {
00939       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00940 
00941       for (;i>0; i--)
00942         --tmp;
00943 
00944       return *this;
00945     }
00946 
00947     const_reverse_iterator
00948     operator - (size_t i)const
00949     {
00950       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00951 
00952       for (;i>0; i--)
00953         ++tmp;
00954       
00955       return tmp;
00956     }
00957 
00958     size_t operator - (const const_reverse_iterator& other) const
00959     {
00960       const_reverse_iterator tmp(other);
00961       size_t i = 0;
00962 
00963       if (indice_ != other.indice_)
00964         return -1;
00965 
00966       if (*this>other)
00967         for (; tmp!=*this; i++)
00968           ++tmp;
00969       
00970       if (*this<other)
00971         for (; tmp!=*this; i--)
00972           --tmp;      
00973       
00974       return i;
00975     }
00976 
00977   private:
00978     size_t bi_;//index in bucket
00979     size_t ii_;// indice index
00980     const INDEX_* indice_;
00981   };
00982 
00983   
00984 protected:
00985   INDEX_* indice_;
00986   size_t idx_len_;
00987   size_t idx_size_;
00988   size_t length_;//1< String length.
00989 
00990   inline bool refer_all()
00991   {
00992     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00993       return false;
00994 
00995     //lock
00996     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
00997     {
00998       indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
00999     }
01000     
01001     return true;
01002   }
01003 
01004   inline bool refer(size_t i)
01005   {
01006     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01007       return false;
01008 
01009     //lock
01010     assert(i<idx_len_);
01011     indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
01012     
01013     return true;
01014   }
01015 
01016   void derefer_all()
01017   {
01018     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_size_; i++)
01019       derefer(i);
01020         
01021     idx_len_ = length_ = 0;
01022   }
01023 
01024   void derefer(size_t i)
01025   {
01026     //lock
01027     assert(i<idx_size_);
01028     
01029     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01030     {
01031       if (indice_[i].bptr_!=NULL)
01032         hlfree(indice_[i].bptr_);
01033       indice_[i].bptr_  = NULL;
01034       indice_[i].len_ = 0;
01035       return;
01036     }
01037 
01038     if (indice_[i].bptr_ == NULL)
01039       return;
01040     
01041     if (!indice_[i].bptr_->is_refered())
01042       hlfree(indice_[i].bptr_);
01043     else
01044       indice_[i].bptr_->derefer();
01045     
01046     indice_[i].bptr_ = NULL;
01047   }
01048   
01049   void clear_all_reference()
01050   {     
01051     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01052       return ;
01053 
01054     
01055     //lock
01056     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
01057     {
01058       indice_[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
01059     }
01060 
01061   }
01062   
01063   void clear_reference(size_t i)
01064   {     
01065     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01066       return ;
01067 
01068     assert(i<idx_size_);
01069     
01070     //lock
01071     indice_[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
01072 
01073   }
01074 
01075   inline void clear_indice(size_t i, size_t n)
01076   {
01077     for (size_t j=0;j<n;j++)
01078     {
01079       indice_[i+j].bptr_ = NULL;
01080       indice_[i+j].len_ = 0;
01081     }
01082 
01083   }
01084   
01085 
01086   inline size_t getLen(const CharT* s) const
01087   {
01088     CharT e = '\0';
01089     size_t i = 0;
01090     
01091     while (s[i]!=e)
01092     {
01093       i++;
01094     }
01095 
01096     return i;
01097   }
01098 
01099   static inline BUCKET_* new_bucket()
01100   {
01101     BUCKET_* bu = (BUCKET_*)hlmalloc(BUCKET_SIZE);
01102     bu->clear_reference();
01103     return bu;
01104   }
01105 
01106   inline BUCKET_* new_bucket(size_t i)const
01107   {
01108     assert(i<idx_len_ && indice_[i].bptr_!=NULL);
01109     
01110     BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
01111     memcpy(bu, indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
01112     bu->clear_reference();
01113     
01114     return bu;
01115   }
01116   
01117   void duplicate(size_t i)
01118   {  
01119     BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
01120     memcpy(bu, indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
01121     bu->clear_reference();
01122 
01123     if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01124       derefer(i);
01125     
01126     indice_[i].bptr_ = bu;
01127   }
01128   
01129   size_t duplicate(INDEX_** indice) const
01130   {
01131     *indice = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_len_*sizeof(INDEX_));
01132     memcpy (*indice, indice_, idx_len_*sizeof(INDEX_));
01133 
01134     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
01135     {
01136       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01137       {
01138         (*indice)[i].bptr_->refer();
01139         continue;
01140       }
01141 
01142       BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
01143       memcpy(bu, (*indice)[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
01144       (*indice)[i].bptr_ = bu;
01145     }
01146 
01147 
01148     return idx_len_;
01149   }
01150   
01151   size_t duplicate(size_t start, size_t n, INDEX_** indice) const
01152   {
01153     assert(start + n <= length_);
01154     
01155     size_t s = binary_search(start, 0, idx_len_-1);
01156     // std::cout<<start<<" "<<idx_len_<<" "<<s<<std::endl;
01157 //     display();
01158     
01159     size_t e = binary_search(start+n-1, s, idx_len_-1);
01160     
01161     size_t last_s = s==0? 0: indice_[s-1].len_;
01162     *indice = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc((e-s+1)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01163 
01164     // if entire bucket
01165     if (start-last_s == 0 && COPY_ON_WRITE)
01166     {
01167       (*indice)[0].bptr_ = indice_[s].bptr_;
01168       if (n >= indice_[s].len_-start)
01169         (*indice)[0].bptr_->refer();
01170       else
01171         (*indice)[0].bptr_ = new_bucket(s);
01172     }
01173     else
01174     {
01175       (*indice)[0].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01176       memcpy((*indice)[0].bptr_->p_, indice_[s].bptr_->p_ + (start-last_s)*sizeof(CharT),
01177              BUCKET_SIZE-(start-last_s)*sizeof(CharT));
01178       (*indice)[0].bptr_->clear_reference();
01179     }
01180 
01181     (*indice)[0].len_ = n>indice_[s].len_-start ? indice_[s].len_-start:n;
01182     (*(*indice)[0].bptr_)[(*indice)[0].len_] = '\0';
01183     last_s = indice_[s].len_;
01184     s++;
01185     size_t i=1;
01186 
01187     while (s<=e)
01188     {
01189       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01190       {
01191         (*indice)[i].bptr_ =  indice_[s].bptr_;
01192         if (n-(*indice)[i-1].len_ >= indice_[s].len_-last_s)
01193           (*indice)[i].bptr_->refer();
01194         else
01195           (*indice)[i].bptr_ = new_bucket(s);
01196       }
01197       else
01198       {
01199         (*indice)[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01200         memcpy((*indice)[i].bptr_->p_, indice_[s].bptr_->p_,
01201                (indice_[s].len_-last_s)*sizeof(CharT));
01202         (*indice)[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
01203       }
01204 
01205       (*indice)[i].len_ = (*indice)[i-1].len_ +
01206         (n-(*indice)[i-1].len_ > indice_[s].len_-last_s ? indice_[s].len_-last_s:n-(*indice)[i-1].len_);
01207       (*(*indice)[i].bptr_)[(*indice)[i].len_-(*indice)[i-1].len_] = '\0';
01208       last_s = indice_[s].len_;
01209       s++;
01210       i++;
01211       
01212     }
01213     
01214     return i;
01215   }
01216     
01217   size_t binary_search(size_t i, size_t start, size_t end)const
01218   {
01219     if (end == start)
01220       return end;
01221 
01222     assert(start<end);
01223     
01224     size_t mid = (start+end)/2;
01225     if (i+1 > indice_[mid].len_)
01226       return binary_search(i, mid+1, end);
01227     else if (mid==0 || i+1 <= indice_[mid].len_ && i+1 > indice_[mid-1].len_  )
01228       return mid;
01229     else if (i+1 < indice_[mid].len_)
01230       return binary_search(i, start, mid-1);
01231 
01232     return -1;
01233   }
01234 
01235   bool is_refered(size_t i)
01236   {
01237     //lock
01238     assert(i<idx_size_);
01239     
01240     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01241       return false;
01242 
01243     if (indice_[i].bptr_==NULL)
01244       return false;
01245     
01246     return indice_[i].bptr_->is_refered();
01247     
01248   }
01249   
01250 public:
01254   explicit bbt_string()
01255   {
01256     idx_len_ = length_ = 0;
01257     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(BUCKET_LENGTH*sizeof(INDEX_));
01258     clear_indice(0, BUCKET_LENGTH);
01259     
01260     idx_size_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01261   }
01262 
01266   bbt_string ( const SelfT& str )
01267   {
01268     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01269     indice_ =NULL;
01270     
01271     assign(str);
01272   }
01273 
01279   bbt_string ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n = npos )
01280   {
01281     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01282     indice_ =NULL;
01283     assign(str, pos, n);
01284   }
01285 
01290   bbt_string ( const CharT * s, size_t n )
01291   {
01292     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01293     indice_ =NULL;
01294     
01295     assign(s, n);
01296   }
01297 
01304   bbt_string ( const CharT * s )
01305   {
01306     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01307     indice_ =NULL;
01308     
01309     assign(s);
01310   }
01311 
01315   bbt_string ( size_t n, CharT c )

01318     indice_ =NULL;
01319     
01320     assign(n, c);
01321   }
01322 
01326   bbt_string (const std::vector<CharT>& v)
01327   {

01329     indice_ =NULL;
01330     
01331     assign(v);
01332   }
01333 
01337   bbt_string (const std::string& str)
01338   {
01339     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01340     indice_ =NULL;
01341     
01342     assign(str);
01343   }
01344 
01354   template<class InputIterator> bbt_string (InputIterator begin, InputIterator end)
01355   {
01356     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01357     indice_ =NULL;
01358     
01359     assign(begin(), end);
01360   }
01361 
01362   virtual ~bbt_string()
01363   {
01364     clear();
01365   }
01366 
01372   SelfT& operator= ( const SelfT& str )
01373   {
01374     return this->assign(str);
01375   }
01376 
01377   SelfT& operator= ( const CharT* s )
01378   {
01379     return this->assign(s);
01380   }
01381

01383   {
01384     this->assign(1, c);
01385     return *this;
01386   }

01388   //******************Iterators********************
01389 public:
01390 
01397   const_iterator begin() const
01398   {
01399     return const_iterator(indice_, 0, 0);
01400   }
01401 
01402   iterator begin()
01403   {
01404     return iterator(indice_, 0, 0);
01405   }
01406 
01413   const_iterator end() const
01414   {
01415     if (length_==0)
01416       return begin();
01417     
01418     //return const_iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_));
01419     return const_iterator(indice_, idx_len_, 0);
01420   }
01421 
01422   iterator end()
01423   {
01424     if (length_==0)
01425       return begin();
01426 
01427     //return iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_));
01428     return iterator(indice_, idx_len_, 0);
01429   }
01430 
01437   reverse_iterator rbegin()
01438   {
01439     return reverse_iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_)-1);
01440   }
01441 
01442   const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const
01443   {
01444     return const_reverse_iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_)-1);
01445   }
01446 
01454   reverse_iterator rend()
01455   {
01456     if (length_==0)
01457       return rbegin();
01458     
01459     return reverse_iterator(indice_, -1, 0);
01460   }
01461 
01462   const_reverse_iterator rend() const
01463   {
01464     if (length_==0)
01465       return rbegin();
01466     
01467     return const_reverse_iterator(indice_, -1, 0);
01468   }
01469 
01470 
01471   //******************Capacity********************
01472 public:
01473 
01478   size_t size() const
01479   {
01480     return length_ * sizeof(CharT);
01481   }
01482 
01486   size_t length() const
01487   {
01488     return length_;
01489   }
01490 
01494   size_t indice_length() const
01495   {
01496     return idx_len_;
01497   }
01498 
01502   size_t max_size ( ) const
01503   {
01504     return idx_len_ * BUCKET_LENGTH;
01505   }
01506 
01518   void resize (size_t n, CharT c)
01519   {
01520     if (n == length_ )
01521       return;
01522     
01523     if (n < length_)
01524     {
01525       size_t i = binary_search(n-1, 0, idx_len_-1);
01526       size_t il = i==0? 0: indice_[i-1].len_;
01527       indice_[i].len_ = n;
01528 
01529       duplicate(i);
01530       
01531       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[n-il]= '\0';
01532       
01533       for (size_t j=i+1; j<idx_size_; j++)
01534         derefer(j);
01535       
01536       idx_len_ = i+1;
01537       length_ = n;
01538       
01539       return;
01540     }
01541 
01542     append(n-length_, c);
01543   }
01544 
01545   void resize ( size_t n )
01546   {
01547     if (n == max_size())
01548       return;
01549 
01550     resize(n, 0);
01551   }
01552 
01566   size_t capacity ( ) const
01567   {
01568     size_t i=0;
01569     //std::cout<<idx_len_<<"-"<<idx_size_<<std::endl;
01570     
01571     for (; i<idx_size_; i++)
01572       if (indice_[i].bptr_ == NULL)
01573         break;
01574     
01575     return i * sizeof(CharT) * BUCKET_LENGTH;
01576   }
01577 
01586   void reserve ( size_t res_arg=0 )
01587   {
01588     if (res_arg<= capacity())
01589       return;
01590     
01591     size_t n = res_arg/sizeof(CharT);
01592     n = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0?0:1)-idx_len_;
01593 
01594     assert(n>0);
01595 
01596     if (idx_len_+n > idx_size_){
01597       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (idx_len_+n)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01598       clear_indice(idx_size_, idx_len_+n-idx_size_);
01599       idx_size_ = idx_len_+n;
01600     }
01601 
01602     for (size_t i=0; i<n; i++)
01603     {
01604       if (indice_[idx_len_+i].bptr_!=NULL)
01605       {
01606         if (is_refered(idx_len_+i))
01607           derefer(idx_len_+i);
01608       }
01609       
01610 
01611       if (indice_[idx_len_+i].bptr_ == NULL)
01612         indice_[idx_len_+i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01613       
01614       indice_[idx_len_+i].len_ = indice_[idx_len_+i-1].len_;
01615     }
01616 
01617     //idx_len_ += n;
01618   }
01619 
01624   void clear()
01625   {
01626     derefer_all();
01627     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01628 
01629     if (indice_!=NULL)
01630       hlfree(indice_);
01631     indice_ = NULL;
01632   }
01633 
01639   bool empty ( ) const
01640   {
01641     return (length_==0);
01642   }
01643 
01644   //******************Element access********************
01645 public:
01652   const CharT& operator[] ( size_t pos ) const
01653   {
01654     assert(pos<length_);
01655 
01656     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01657     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01658 
01659     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01660   }
01661   
01662   CharT& operator[] ( size_t pos )
01663   {
01664     assert(pos<length_);
01665 
01666     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01667     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01668     assert(pos>=l);
01669     
01670     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01671       return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01672 
01673     bool f = (indice_[t].bptr_!=NULL) && (*(ReferT*)(indice_[t].bptr_->p_ + BUCKET_BYTES)>1);
01674     if (f)
01675       duplicate(t);
01676     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01677     // size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01678 //     if (is_refered(t))
01679 //       duplicate(t);
01680 
01681 //     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01682 
01683 //     assert(pos>=l);
01684 
01685 //     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01686     
01687   }
01688 
01694   const CharT& at ( size_t pos ) const
01695   {
01696     assert(pos<length_);
01697 
01698     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01699     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01700 
01701     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01702   }
01703   
01704   CharT& at ( size_t pos )
01705   {
01706     assert(pos<length_);
01707 
01708     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01709     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01710     assert(pos>=l);
01711     
01712     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01713       return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01714 
01715     bool f = (indice_[t].bptr_!=NULL) && (*(ReferT*)(indice_[t].bptr_->p_ + BUCKET_BYTES)>1);
01716     if (f)
01717       duplicate(t);
01718     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01719 //     assert(pos<length_);
01720 //     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01721 //     if (is_refered(t))
01722 //       duplicate(t);
01723 
01724 //     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01725 
01726 //     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01727   }

01729   //******************Modifiers********************
01730 public:
01738   SelfT& operator+= ( const SelfT& str )
01739   {
01740     return append(str);
01741   }
01742   
01743   SelfT& operator+= ( const CharT* s )
01744   {
01745     size_t len = getLen(s);
01746     return append(s, len);
01747   }
01748   
01749   SelfT& operator+= ( CharT c )
01750   {
01751     return append(1, c);
01752   }
01753 
01757   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str )
01758   {
01759     if (str.length()==0)
01760       return *this;
01761 
01762     if (idx_len_>0)
01763     {
01764       size_t ei = indice_[idx_len_-1].len_- (idx_len_>1? indice_[idx_len_-2].len_: 0);
01765       if (ei+str.length() <= BUCKET_LENGTH)
01766       {
01767         if (is_refered(idx_len_-1))
01768           duplicate(idx_len_-1);
01769         for (const_iterator i=str.begin(); i!= str.end();i++, ei++, length_++)
01770           (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[ei] = *i;
01771         (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[ei] = '\0';
01772         indice_[idx_len_-1].len_ += str.length();
01773         return *this;
01774       }
01775     }
01776     
01777     //extend indice
01778     if (str.indice_length()+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01779     {
01780       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (str.indice_length()+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01781       clear_indice(idx_size_, idx_len_+str.indice_length()-idx_size_);
01782       idx_size_ = str.indice_length()+idx_len_;
01783     }
01784 
01785     for (size_t j=idx_len_; j<idx_size_;j++)
01786       derefer(j);
01787     
01788     memcpy(indice_+idx_len_, str.indice_, str.indice_length()*sizeof(INDEX_));
01789 
01790     //copy str into
01791     for (size_t i=idx_len_; i<idx_len_+str.indice_length(); i++)
01792     {
01793       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01794       {
01795         indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
01796       }
01797       else
01798       {
01799         duplicate(i);
01800       }
01801 
01802       indice_[i].len_ += length_;
01803     }
01804 
01805     idx_len_ += str.indice_length();
01806     length_ += str.length();
01807     
01808     return *this;
01809   }
01810 
01816   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n=npos )
01817   {
01818     return append(str.substr(pos, n));
01819   }
01820 
01824   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
01825   {
01826     if (n == 0)
01827       return *this;
01828 
01829     size_t k=0;
01830     if (idx_len_>0)
01831     {
01832       size_t ei = indice_[idx_len_-1].len_- (idx_len_>1? indice_[idx_len_-2].len_: 0)-1;
01833       if (ei+1<BUCKET_LENGTH)
01834       {
01835         if (is_refered(idx_len_-1))
01836           duplicate(idx_len_-1);
01837         
01838         size_t j=ei+1;
01839         for (; j<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; j++, k++)
01840           (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = s[k];
01841         indice_[idx_len_-1].len_ += k;
01842         (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = '\0';
01843         length_ += k;
01844       }
01845 
01846       if (k == n)
01847         return *this;
01848     }
01849     
01850     
01851     size_t ex = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
01852     //extend indice
01853     if (ex+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01854     {
01855       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01856       clear_indice(idx_size_, ex+idx_len_-idx_size_);
01857       idx_size_ = ex+idx_len_;
01858     }
01859     
01860     for (size_t j= idx_len_; k<n; j++, idx_len_++)
01861     {
01862       if (is_refered(j))
01863         derefer(j);
01864       if (indice_[j].bptr_==NULL)
01865         indice_[j].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01866 
01867 
01868       size_t t=0;
01869       for (; t<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; k++,t++, length_++)
01870         (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = s[k];
01871 
01872       (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = '\0';
01873       indice_[j].len_ = indice_[j-1].len_ + t;
01874     }
01875     
01876     return *this;
01877     
01878   }
01879 
01886   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s )
01887   {
01888     size_t len = getLen(s);
01889     return append(s, len);
01890   }
01891 
01895   SelfT& append ( size_t n, CharT c )
01896   {
01897     if (n==0)
01898       return *this;
01899 
01900     size_t k=0;
01901     if (idx_len_>0)
01902     {
01903       size_t ei = indice_[idx_len_-1].len_- (idx_len_>1? indice_[idx_len_-2].len_: 0)-1;
01904       if (ei+1<BUCKET_LENGTH)
01905       {
01906         if (is_refered(idx_len_-1))
01907           duplicate(idx_len_-1);
01908 
01909         size_t j=ei+1;
01910         for (; j<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; j++, k++)
01911           (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = c;
01912       
01913         indice_[idx_len_-1].len_ += k;
01914         (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = '\0';
01915         length_ += k;
01916       }
01917 
01918       if (k == n)
01919         return *this;
01920     }
01921     
01922     size_t ex = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
01923     //extend indice
01924     if (ex+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01925     {
01926       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01927       clear_indice(idx_size_, ex+idx_len_-idx_size_);
01928       idx_size_ = ex+idx_len_;
01929     }
01930 
01931     for (size_t j= idx_len_; k<n; j++, idx_len_++)
01932     {
01933       if (is_refered(j))
01934         derefer(j);
01935       
01936       if (indice_[j].bptr_ == NULL)
01937         indice_[j].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01938 
01939       size_t t=0;
01940       for (;t<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; k++,t++,length_++)
01941         (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = c;
01942 
01943       (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = '\0';
01944       indice_[j].len_ = (j>0? indice_[j-1].len_:0) + t;
01945     }
01946 
01947     return *this;
01948   }
01949 
01958   template <class InputIterator>
01959   SelfT& append ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01960   {
01961     for (InputIterator i=first(); i!=last; i++)
01962       appand(1, *i);
01963 
01964     return *this;
01965   }
01966 
01972   void push_back ( CharT c )
01973   {
01974     append(1, c);
01975   }
01976 
01980   void push_front(const SelfT& str)
01981   {
01982     size_t ex = str.indice_length();
01983     
01984     //extend indice
01985     if (ex+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01986     {
01987       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01988       idx_size_ = ex + idx_len_;
01989     }
01990 
01991     //shift indice
01992     for (size_t i=idx_len_-1; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
01993     {
01994       indice_[i].len_ += str.length();
01995       indice_[i+ex] = indice_[i];
01996     }
01997     idx_len_ += ex;
01998 
01999     memcpy(indice_, str.indice_, str.indice_length()*sizeof(INDEX_));
02000 
02001     for (size_t i=0; i<str.indice_length(); i++)
02002     {
02003       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
02004       {
02005         refer(i);
02006         continue;
02007       }
02008 
02009       duplicate(i);
02010     }
02011 
02012     length_ += str.length();
02013   }
02014 
02018   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str )
02019   {
02020     clear();
02021 
02022     idx_size_ = idx_len_ = str.duplicate(&indice_);
02023 
02024     length_ = str.length();
02025       
02026     return *this;
02027   }
02028 
02035   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n )
02036   {
02037     if (n != npos)
02038       assert(str.length_ >= pos+n);
02039 
02040     clear();
02041     
02042     if (n == npos)
02043         length_ = str.length_ - pos;
02044       else
02045         length_ = n;
02046     
02047     idx_len_ = idx_size_ = str.duplicate(pos, length_, &indice_);
02048     
02049     return *this;
02050   }
02051 
02056   SelfT& assign ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
02057   {
02058     clear();
02059 
02060     idx_len_ = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
02061     idx_size_ = idx_len_ > BUCKET_LENGTH? idx_len_: BUCKET_LENGTH;
02062     length_ = n;
02063     
02064     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
02065     clear_indice(0, idx_size_);
02066 
02067     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
02068     {
02069       indice_[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
02070       size_t lastl = i==0?0: indice_[i-1].len_;
02071       indice_[i].len_ = (n-lastl > BUCKET_LENGTH? BUCKET_LENGTH: n-lastl) + lastl;
02072       
02073       memcpy(indice_[i].bptr_->p_, s+lastl, (indice_[i].len_-lastl)*sizeof(CharT));
02074       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[indice_[i].len_ - lastl] = '\0';
02075     }
02076     
02077     return *this;
02078   }
02079 
02086   SelfT& assign ( const CharT* s )
02087   {
02088     assert (s !=NULL);
02089     derefer_all();
02090     
02091     length_ = getLen(s);
02092 
02093     return assign(s, length_);
02094   }
02095 
02099   SelfT& assign ( size_t n, CharT c )
02100   {
02101     derefer_all();
02102     
02103     idx_len_ = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
02104     idx_size_ = idx_len_ > BUCKET_LENGTH? idx_len_: BUCKET_LENGTH;
02105     length_ = n;
02106     
02107     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
02108     memset (indice_, 0, idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
02109 
02110     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
02111     {
02112       indice_[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
02113       indice_[i].len_ = n>BUCKET_LENGTH? BUCKET_LENGTH: n;
02114       n -= indice_[i].len_;
02115 
02116       for (size_t j=0; j<indice_[i].len_; j++)
02117         (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j] = c;
02118       
02119       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[indice_[i].len_] = '\0';
02120       indice_[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
02121       if (i>0)
02122         indice_[i].len_ += indice_[i-1].len_;
02123     }
02124     
02125     return *this;
02126   }
02127 
02131   SelfT& assign (const std::vector<CharT>& v)
02132   {
02133     return assign(v.data(), v.size());
02134   }
02135 
02139   SelfT& assign (const std::string& str)
02140   {
02141     return assign((CharT*)str.c_str(), str.length()/sizeof(CharT));
02142   }
02143 
02152   template <class InputIterator>
02153   SelfT& assign ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
02154   {
02155     derefer_all();
02156     InputIterator i=first;
02157     if (i!=last)
02158     {
02159       assign(1, *i);
02160       i++;
02161     }
02162     
02163     for (; i!=last; i++)
02164       append(1, *i);
02165 
02166     return *this;
02167   }
02168 
02172   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, const SelfT& str )
02173   {
02174     if (str.length() == 0)
02175       return *this;
02176 
02177     if (this == &str)
02178     {
02179       SelfT s = str;
02180       return insert(pos1, s);
02181     }
02182 
02183     length_ += str.length();
02184     size_t s = binary_search(pos1, 0, idx_len_-1);
02185     size_t last_s = (s==0? 0: indice_[s-1].len_);
02186     size_t ii = pos1-last_s;
02187 
02188     //within one bucket
02189     if (str.length() + indice_[s].len_-last_s<=BUCKET_LENGTH)
02190     {
02191       //std::cout<<str.length()<<" "<<s<<std::endl;
02192       //str.display();
02193       
02194       if (is_refered(s))
02195         duplicate(s);
02196       BUCKET_* bu = indice_[s].bptr_;
02197       
02198       for (size_t i = indice_[s].len_-last_s-1; i>ii; i--)
02199         (*bu)[i+str.length()] = (*bu)[i];
02200       (*bu)[indice_[s].len_-last_s+str.length()]= '\0';
02201       
02202       for (size_t i = 0; i<str.length(); i++)
02203         (*bu)[ii+1+i] = str[i];
02204 
02205       for (size_t i=s; i<idx_len_; i++)
02206         indice_[i].len_ += str.length();
02207       
02208       return *this;
02209     }
02210 
02211     size_t ex = str.indice_length();
02212     BUCKET_* tail = NULL;
02213     size_t tt = 0;
02214 
02215     //split bucket
02216     if (ii+1 < indice_[s].len_-last_s)
02217     {
02218       ex++;
02219       //copy head
02220       if (is_refered(s))
02221         duplicate(s);
02222 
02223       //copy tail
02224       tail = new_bucket();
02225       memcpy(tail, indice_[s].bptr_->p_+(ii+1)*sizeof(CharT), (BUCKET_LENGTH - (ii+1))*sizeof(CharT));
02226       tail->clear_reference();
02227       tt  = indice_[s].len_ - last_s - ii-1;
02228       (*tail)[tt] = '\0';
02229 
02230       (*indice_[s].bptr_)[ii+1] = '\0';
02231       indice_[s].len_ = last_s + ii + 1;
02232     }
02233 
02234     last_s = indice_[s].len_;
02235 
02236     //extend indice
02237     if (ex + idx_len_>idx_size_)
02238     {
02239       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
02240       idx_size_ = ex + idx_len_;
02241     }
02242 
02243     //shift indices
02244     for (size_t i = idx_len_-1; i>s; i--)
02245       indice_[i+ex] = indice_[i];
02246     memcpy(indice_+s+1, str.indice_, str.indice_length()*sizeof(INDEX_));
02247 
02248     //copy str into
02249     for (size_t i=s+1; i<s+1+str.indice_length(); i++)
02250     {
02251       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
02252         indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
02253       else
02254         duplicate(i);
02255       
02256       indice_[i].len_ += last_s;
02257     }
02258 
02259     idx_len_ += ex;
02260 
02261     if (tail!=NULL)
02262     {
02263       indice_[s+1+str.indice_length()].bptr_ = tail;
02264       indice_[s+1+str.indice_length()].len_ = indice_[s+str.indice_length()].len_ + tt;
02265     }
02266 
02267     for (size_t i=s+ex+1; i<idx_len_; i++)
02268       indice_[i].len_ += str.length();
02269 
02270     return *this;
02271   }
02272

02347   template<class InputIterator>
02348   void insert( iterator p, InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
02349   {

02351     SelfT s;

02353

02363   SelfT& erase ( size_t pos = 0, size_t n = npos )
02364   {
02365     if (pos>=length_ || n==0)
02366       return *this;
02367 
02368     if (n == npos)
02369       n = length_ -pos;
02370 
02371     length_ -= n;
02372     size_t i = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
02373     size_t e = binary_search(pos+n-1, i, idx_len_-1);
02374 
02375     size_t il = i==0?0 : indice_[i-1].len_;
02376     size_t el = e==0?0 : indice_[e-1].len_;
02377 
02378     if (i == e)
02379     {
02380       if (is_refered(i))
02381         duplicate(i);
02382 
02383       size_t j=pos+n-il;
02384       for (; j<indice_[i].len_-il;j++ )
02385         (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j-n] = (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j];
02386       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j-n] = '\0';
02387 
02388       for (size_t j=i; j<idx_len_; j++)
02389         indice_[j].len_ -= n;
02390       
02391       return *this;
02392     }
02393 
02394     assert(pos>=il);
02395     assert(pos+n-1>=el);
02396     
02397     size_t si = pos - il;
02398     size_t ei = pos+n-1 - el;
02399 
02400     if (si>0)
02401     {
02402       if (is_refered(i))
02403       {
02404         duplicate(i);
02405       }
02406 
02407       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[si] = '\0';
02408       indice_[i].len_ = il + si;
02409       i++;
02410     }
02411 
02412     if (ei+1 < indice_[e].len_-el)
02413     {
02414       if (is_refered(e))
02415       {
02416         duplicate(e);
02417       }
02418 
02419       for (size_t j=ei+1; j<indice_[e].len_-el; j++)
02420         (*indice_[e].bptr_)[j-ei-1] = (*indice_[e].bptr_)[j];
02421       
02422       (*indice_[e].bptr_)[indice_[e].len_-el-ei-1] = '\0';
02423       
02424       e--;
02425     }
02426 
02427     //std::cout<<i<<" "<<e<<std::endl;
02428 
02429     //display();
02430     for (size_t j=i; j<=e; j++)
02431         derefer(j);
02432 
02433     for (size_t j=e+1; j<idx_len_; j++)
02434       indice_[j].len_ -= n;
02435     
02436     for (size_t j=e+1; e+1>i && j<idx_len_; j++)
02437     {
02438       indice_[j - (e-i+1)] = indice_[j];
02439       indice_[j].bptr_ = NULL;
02440     }
02441 
02442     if (e+1>i)
02443       idx_len_ -= (e-i+1);
02444     
02445     return *this;
02446   }
02447 
02452   iterator erase ( iterator position )
02453   {
02454     size_t i = position - begin();
02455     erase(i, 1);
02456     return iterator(begin()+i);
02457   }

02462   iterator erase ( iterator first, iterator last )
02463   {
02464     uint64_t i = first - begin();
02465     uint64_t j = last - begin();
02466     erase(i, j-i);
02467     return iterator(begin()+i);
02468   }
02469 
02483   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1,   const SelfT& str )
02484   {
02485     erase(pos1, n1);
02486 
02487     if (str.length()==0)
02488       return *this;
02489 
02490     if (pos1>1)
02491       insert(pos1-1, str);
02492     else
02493       push_front(str);
02494     
02495     return *this;
02496   }
02497 
02501   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, const SelfT& str )
02502   {
02503     assert(i1<=i2);
02504     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02505     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02506     return replace(i, j-i+1, str);
02507   }

02516   {
02517     return replace(pos1, n1, str.substr(pos2, n2));
02518   }

02596   template<class InputIterator>
02597   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, InputIterator j1, InputIterator j2 )
02598   {
02599     assert(i1<=i2);
02600     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02601     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02602     SelfT s1 = substr(i, j-i+1);
02603     SelfT s2 = substr(j+1);
02604     assign(s1);
02605     append<InputIterator>(j1, j2);
02606     append(s2);
02607 
02608     return *this;
02609   }
02610 
02621   size_t copy ( CharT* s, size_t n, size_t pos = 0) const
02622   {
02623     if (pos + n >= length_)
02624       n = length_-pos;
02625     
02626     size_t i = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
02627     size_t e = binary_search(pos+n-1, i, idx_len_-1);
02628     size_t il = i==0?0 : indice_[i-1].len_;
02629     size_t si = pos - il;
02630 
02631     if (e == i)
02632     {
02633       for (size_t j=0; j<n; j++)
02634       {
02635         s[j] = (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j+si];
02636       }
02637       
02638       return n;
02639 
02640     }
02641 
02642     for (size_t j=i,k=0; j<=e; j++)
02643     {
02644       size_t t = 0;
02645       if (j==i)
02646         t = si;
02647 
02648       for (; (*indice_[i].bptr_)[t]!='\0' && k<n; t++,k++)
02649         s[k] = (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t];
02650       
02651     }
02652     
02653     return n;
02654   }
02655 
02662   void swap ( SelfT& str )
02663   {
02664     SelfT s = str;
02665     str = *this;
02666     *this = s;
02667   }

02710   size_t find ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02711   {
02712     size_t i = Algorithm<SelfT>::KMP(substr(pos), str);
02713     if (i == (size_t)-1)
02714       return -1;
02715     
02716     return pos + i;
02717   }

02735   size_t find ( CharT c, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02736   {
02737     size_t r = 0;
02738     
02739     for (const_iterator i =begin()+pos; i<end(); i++, r++)
02740       if (*i==c)
02741         return r+pos;
02742     
02743     return -1;
02744   }

02768   size_t rfind ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos = npos ) const
02769   {
02770     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02771     
02772     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), str);
02773   }

02780     //ss.attach(s, n);
02781     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), ss);
02782   }

02784   size_t rfind ( const CharT* s, size_t pos = npos ) const
02785   {
02786     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02787     
02788     SelfT ss(s);
02789     //ss.attach(s);
02790     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), ss);
02791   }
02792   
02793   size_t rfind ( CharT c, size_t pos = npos ) const
02794   {
02795     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02796 
02797     if (pos == npos)
02798       pos = length_ -1;
02799     
02800     size_t r = pos;
02801     for (const_reverse_iterator i =rbegin()+(length_-1-pos); i<rend(); i++, r--)
02802       if (*i==c)
02803         return r;
02804     
02805     return -1;
02806   }

02851 
02883   int compare ( const SelfT& str ) const
02884   {
02885     const_iterator i=str.begin();
02886     const_iterator j=begin();
02887     for (; i!=str.end() && j!=end(); i++,j++)
02888     {
02889       if (*j>*i)
02890         return 1;
02891       if (*j<*i)
02892         return -1;
02893     }
02894 
02895     if (i==str.end() && j==end())
02896       return 0;
02897     
02898     if (j== end())
02899       return -1;
02900 
02901     return 1;
02902   }
02903   
02904   int compare ( const CharT* s ) const
02905   {
02906     size_t len = getLen(s);
02907     
02908     size_t i=0;
02909     const_iterator it = begin();
02910     
02911     for (; it!=end() && i<len; i++, it++)
02912     {
02913       //std::cout<<*it<<"  "<<s[i]<<std::endl;
02914       if (*it>s[i])
02915         return 1;
02916       if (*it<s[i])
02917         return -1;
02918     }
02919 
02920     //std::cout<<i<<" "<<length_<<" "<<len<<std::endl;
02921     
02922     if (i==length_ && i==len)
02923       return 0;
02924     if (i== length_)
02925       return -1;
02926 
02927     return 1;
02928   }
02929

02943   }

02951   std::vector<CharT> cast_std_vector()
02952   {
02953     std::vector<CharT> v;
02954     v.resize(length_);
02955     for (const_iterator i =begin();i!=end(); i++)
02956       v.push_back(*i);
02957 
02958     return v;
02959   }
02960   
02961   std::string cast_std_string()
02962   {
02963     std::string v;
02964     v.reserve(length_);
02965     for (const_iterator i =begin();i!=end(); i++)
02966       v += (*i);
02967 
02968     return v;
02969 
02970   }

02976   friend class boost::serialization::access;
02977   template<class Archive>
02978   void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)  const
02979   {
02980     ar & length_;
02981     ar & idx_len_;
02982     ar & idx_size_;
02983 
02984     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
02985     {
02986       ar & indice_[i].len_;
02987       ar.save_binary(indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
02988     }
02989   }
02990 
02991   template<class Archive>
02992   void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
02993   {
02994     clear();
02995     
02996     ar & length_;
02997     ar & idx_len_;
02998     ar & idx_size_;
02999 
03000     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
03001     clear_indice(0, idx_size_);
03002     
03003     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
03004     {
03005       ar & indice_[i].len_;
03006       indice_[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
03007       ar.load_binary(indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
03008     }
03009   }

03016       os<<(char)*i;
